sections.title: Divine Scion (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Divine Scion class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Divine Scion)
sections.description: Divine scions gain no additional weapon or armor proficiencies but can select Greater Weapon Focus, Weapon Specialization, and Greater Weapon Specialization feats without fighter level prerequisites. They also gain spell progression in their existing divine spellcasting class.

sections.title: Opposition Alignment (Ex) (Divine Scion)
sections.description: The divine scion chooses an alignment subtype (chaotic, evil, good, or law) that opposes their own alignment and gains a +1 bonus on caster level checks to overcome spell resistance of creatures with that alignment.

sections.title: Domain Specialization (Su) (Divine Scion)
sections.description: At 3rd level, the divine scion selects a domain from their deity and heals damage equal to twice the spell level whenever casting domain spells from that domain. Each domain grants a specific spell-like ability and permanent sacred/profane bonus.

sections.title: Divine Wrath (Su) (Divine Scion)
sections.description: At 4th level, the divine scion's damaging spells deal +1 point of damage per die against creatures with an alignment subtype matching their opposition alignment.

sections.title: Deific Defense (Su) (Divine Scion)
sections.description: At 7th level, the divine scion gains DR 2, which is bypassed by attacks with the alignment subtype matching their opposition alignment.

sections.title: Divine Awe (Su) (Divine Scion)
sections.description: At 8th level, creatures matching the divine scion's opposition alignment subtype become staggered for 1 round when they fail saves against the divine scion's spells.

sections.title: True Scion (Divine Scion)
sections.description: At 10th level, the divine scion's domain specialization healing doubles, divine wrath increases to +2 damage per die, deific defense increases to DR 5, and they permanently gain +1 to Wisdom or Charisma.
